titles.title: To amend title 10, United States Code, to require a member of the Armed Forces to designate a person to be authorized to direct the disposition of the member's remains if the member should die in service.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Military Personnel.

bill.summary: 5/4/2005--Introduced. Requires a member of the Armed Forces to designate a person to be authorized to direct the disposition of the member's remains if the member should die in service.
